member.name: T:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader
member.summary: Json text reader.
member.remarks: Does not dispose the reader, since we don't own the underlying stream.

member.summary: const tick value for caculating tick values

member.summary: Compiled Regex for DateTime Format.

member.summary: Maximum recursion limit on reader.

member.summary: Reader to reader text into

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.recursionDepth
member.summary: Depth of recursion.

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.#ctor(System.IO.StreamReader)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of Json reader which readers the json text from the given reader
member.param: text reader from which json payload needs to be read. Does not dispose the reader, since we don't own the underlying stream.

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadValue
member.summary: Converts the given value into the right type
member.returns: returns the clr object instance which

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadNextCharacter
member.summary: Gets the next character from the reader. This function moves the enumerator by 1 position
member.returns: the next charater from the current reader position

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.PeekNextCharacter
member.summary: peeks the next character from the reader. This does not move the current reader position.
member.returns: the next character from the current reader position

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.GetCharacters(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the next count characters from the reader's current position
member.returns: string consisting of next count characters

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.PeekNextSignificantCharacter
member.summary: Sets the readers position to the next significant character position
member.returns: returns the next significant character without changing the current position of the reader

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadArray
member.summary: Converts the given text into an arrayList
member.returns: returns the arraylist containing the list of objects

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadBoolean
member.summary: Reads the boolean value
member.returns: returns the boolean value as read from the reader

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadName(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reads the name string from the reader
member.param: true, if you want to allow quotes, otherwise false

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadNull
member.summary: Reads the null literal from the reader

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadNumber
member.summary: Reads the number from the reader.

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadObject
member.summary: Reads the object from the reader
member.returns: returns hashtable containing the list of property names and values

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadString
member.summary: Read the string value from the reader
member.returns: returns the string value read from the reader

member.name: M:Guna.Charts.Licensing.Json.JsonReader.ReadString(System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Read the string value from the reader
member.param: out parameter indicating whether the string has a leading slash or not
member.returns: returns the string value read from the reader

member.summary: Marks the fact that a recursive method was entered, and checks that the depth is allowed.

member.summary: Marks the fact that a recursive method is leaving..

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.V6.Helper.ANIMATE_WINDOW_TYPE.AW_HOR_POSITIVE
member.summary: Animates the window from left to right. This flag can be used with roll or slide animation.

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.V6.Helper.ANIMATE_WINDOW_TYPE.AW_HOR_NEGATIVE
member.summary: Animates the window from right to left. This flag can be used with roll or slide animation.

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.V6.Helper.ANIMATE_WINDOW_TYPE.AW_VER_POSITIVE
member.summary: Animates the window from top to bottom. This flag can be used with roll or slide animation.

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.V6.Helper.ANIMATE_WINDOW_TYPE.AW_VER_NEGATIVE
member.summary: Animates the window from bottom to top. This flag can be used with roll or slide animation.

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.V6.Helper.ANIMATE_WINDOW_TYPE.AW_CENTER
member.summary: Makes the window appear to collapse inward if AW_HIDE is used or expand outward if the AW_HIDE is not used.

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.V6.Helper.ANIMATE_WINDOW_TYPE.AW_HIDE
member.summary: Hides the window. By default, the window is shown.

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.V6.Helper.ANIMATE_WINDOW_TYPE.AW_ACTIVATE
member.summary: Activates the window.

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.V6.Helper.ANIMATE_WINDOW_TYPE.AW_SLIDE
member.summary: Uses slide animation. By default, roll animation is used.

member.name: F:Guna.Charts.Licensing.V6.Helper.ANIMATE_WINDOW_TYPE.AW_BLEND
member.summary: Uses a fade effect. This flag can be used only if hwnd is a top-level window.

member.summary: The title is positioned at the bottom of the chart.
